item.description:
Valley Summit's newest meetup series is a book club! Read a web-related book, then come discuss the points with web professionals and hobbyists.

The first book for this club is The Marketing Agency Blueprint.

This book encourages the building of an agency ecosystem by focusing on core competencies and consulting with other agencies for their specialties. By reading this book, freelancers and agencies can discuss the various ideas presented and help each other develop their processes with clients and one another.

Visit our website to see the other meetups we run, and listen for announcements via twitter, @valleysummit.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Valley Summit Book Club
